messages.content: ComfyUI-HfLoader is a simple and easy to use Hugging Face model loader for ComfyUI.

You can install ComfyUI-HfLoader by running `git clone https://github.com/olduvai-jp/ComfyUI-HfLoader.git` in the `custom_node` directory and then installing the package with `pip install huggingface-hub`.
What is the usage of the LoRA Loader From Hf?

The LoRA Loader From Hf is used to load a model from Hugging Face model hub. It requires parameters such as repo_name, filename, api_token (if the repo is public, this can be left empty), strength_model, and strength_clip.
What is the purpose of the api_token parameter in LoRA Loader From Hf?
The api_token parameter is used for accessing private repositories on the Hugging Face model hub. If the repo is public, this can be left empty.
What is the significance of the strength_model and strength_clip parameters in LoRA Loader From Hf?

The strength_model parameter is used to determine how strongly to modify the diffusion model and can be a negative value, while the strength_clip parameter is used to determine how strongly to modify the CLIP model and can also be a negative value.
